titles.title: To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 with respect to enforcement provisions.

term.name: Occupational Safety and Health Review Commission

bill.summary: 2/17/2005--Introduced. Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require the Secretary of Labor to issue an employer a citation and remit a notice of proposed assessment of penalty within 30 workdays following an inspection or investigation (currently, with reasonable promptness for the citation and within a reasonable time for the proposed penalty assessment).
